author: taulepton_
content: An observation... if we want to deprecate the envelope, we need to migrate more than just the execution payload header. execution requests, blob kzg commitments, and the state root come to mind, as I believe these are consensus-critical. I'm not sure if this leaks any information about the block that the builder would want obscured if they decide to withhold their block.

author: nero_eth
content: The kzg commitments are already moved into the bid with ePBS. The execution requests can move there too, same for the state root (which we should delay (eip-7862)).
